metadata.description:
Music Compose & Arranged by Motoi Sakuraba

Original Music Composed by
Kazumi Totaka / Nintendo Co.,Ltd.
Kozue Ishikawa / Nintendo Co.,Ltd.
Yukio Kaneoka / Nintendo Co.,Ltd.

Editing & Directed by Kohshyoh Ohtake
Music Performed & Sequenced by "vAin"

Product Management by
Tomomi Takemura / OHTAKE LTD.
Digital Mastered by Wataru Ishii / ONKIO HAUS

Art Direction & Design by
Syuuichi Ohki / ENTERBRAIN,INC.

Special Thanks to
Hiroyuki Takahashi / CAMELOT Co.,Ltd.
Shugo Takahashi / CAMELOT Co.,Ltd.
Takanao Kondo / Nintendo Co.,Ltd.
Mitsuaki Hagishima / Nintendo Co.,Ltd.
Masaaki Uno / CAMELOT Co.,Ltd.

Thanks to
Yoshinobu Imamura (FAMITSU P.P.)
Minako Seki (FAMITSU Sound) / ENTERBRAIN,INC.

Produced by
Sachio Masugata (FAMITSU Sound) /
ENTERBRAIN,INC.
